name: Shaman Dance
description:
It is during the dance that the shamans get in contact with the spirit world.

What is this game?

Rhythm-based shamanic battle ritual where you "dance" a series of steps looped forever. Try to pacify as many spirits as you can, but remember, the spirits also have their own "dance" loops so the key to victory is to learn, match and adapt!

Recommendations
  • Play with sound turned on.
How to play

Hold arrows keys or WASD to direct the battle dance actions (move and attack).

Tools used
  • Unity
  • Rider
  • Miro
  • Audacity
  • Trello
